alert.note: Alert for Bent County Including Las Animas; Crowley County Including Ordway; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Kiowa County Including Eads; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 08 at 2:34PM MST until November 09 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 231, 232, 233, 234, AND 235... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 231, 232, 233, 234 and 235. * Timing...Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * Winds...South 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
